name: Spinny
description:
Silly little game I cracked together in a few hours warming up for the GMC Jam #3

Its a speed run gravity puzzle!

Keyboard Controls:

Move - left and right

Jump - space

rotate world q and e

Gamepad Controls

Left stick - move

Button 1/X/triangle = jump

left trigger rotate clockwise

right trigger rotate counterclockwise

select closes the program

start resets the level
